title: Weird Display Sans Serif
content:
the greatest joy of design is working with a client that has no brand guidelines. LOL need some help ID'ing this font. thanks for any suggestions!

L

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020213153im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-16%20at%209_4437.11.36%20AM.png)
author: luccio

comments.content:
It appears to be a customized version of a geometric sans. The following are similar, but not spot-on matches:

Schelter Grotesk NF Bold  
AG Old Face Regular  
Adequate Medium

Adequate Medium looks pretty similar, but I think you're right. It's a custom face. And that was my fear. Thanks a mil, mate!

L
